definitions: having or making a sound or sounds caused by the reflection of sound waves from a surface back to the listener

examples.text: his voice has a hollow, echoey quality

shortDefinitions: making sound caused by reflection of sound waves from surface

definitions: (of sound or music) characterized by the deliberate introduction of reverberation

examples.text: the sound enhancement was too echoey for our taste

shortDefinitions: (of sound or music) characterized by deliberate introduction of reverberation
